vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Καίν
(Τ, Κάϊν), ὁ,
indecl.
(in FlJ, Κάϊς, -ιος), (Heb. קַיִן; Gen.4:1),
Cain: Heb.11:4, 1Jn.3:12, Ju 11.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.4.1;
son of: Adam (H0121) and Eve (H2332);
brother of: Abel (H1893) and Seth (H8352);
father of: Enoch (H2585)
§ Cain, "metal worker; brought forth, acquired [Ge. 4:1]"
Cain, (Proper name), indeclinable, Heb. 11:4; 1Jn. 3:12; Jude 11*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
該隱 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來字的意思是 "生產者:製造者（字面上的意思是 鐵匠)"
亞當的長子, 殺了其兄弟亞伯
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
该隐 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来字的意思是 "生产者:制造者（字面上的意思是 铁匠)"
亚当的长子, 杀了其兄弟亚伯
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ca-in: nghĩa là « được, giành được » hay « sở hữu » xem H7014
